Record.ClassificationPath: Immune System Diseases/Immunologic Deficiency Syndromes/Leukocyte-Adhesion Deficiency Syndrome
Record.Description: Rare, autosomal recessive disorder caused by deficiency of the beta 2 integrin receptors (RECEPTORS, LEUKOCYTE-ADHESION) comprising the CD11/CD18 family of glycoproteins. The syndrome is characterized by abnormal adhesion-dependent functions, especially defective tissue emigration of neutrophils, leading to recurrent infection.
